mapper.sql: SELECT commodity.id, temp.name, commodity.round_time AS roundTime, temp.genre, IFNULL(type.name,'未知类型') AS typeName, IFNULL(state.name, '未知状态') AS stateName, temp.ground_time AS groundTime, temp.undercarriage_time AS undercarriageTime, commodity.view_num AS viewNum, temp.buy_total_number AS buyTotalNumber, commodity.buy_current_number AS buyCurrentNumber, temp.buy_total_number - commodity.buy_current_number AS buyNowNumber FROM t_commoditys AS commodity LEFT JOIN t_commodity_template as temp on commodity.id = temp.id LEFT JOIN t_commodity_type AS type ON temp.commodity_type_id = type.id LEFT JOIN t_commodity_states AS state ON temp.state_id = state.id
